html:
6.12.20  6:23 pm   how many people would you say are listening to your music at any one time

      at least 4

6.12.20  6:17 pm   As a musician, how important is it to have your own "sound?" I feel like all my songs could be written by different people.

      i am envious

6.12.20  6:12 pm   How do you eat your oranges

      first, after using industrial tools to get it open, i go ahead and smear it all over the room and my body, to match the tools and my hands which also had orange smeared all over them during the opening process. by then there is no more orange left because it has smeared all over everything

6.12.20  5:12 pm   Whats so cool about 67?

      well, it triples to 201, we could start there

6.12.20  4:39 pm   Between keys, bass, and drums, which do you like to play live the most? (Or is there a secret instrument you prefer) 

      bass is actually the secret one i prefer

6.12.20  3:58 pm   is there any meaningful difference between cut time (2/2) and common time (4/4), or is there only a difference in actual music notation? 

      in general, you will find the tempo (speed of the quarter note) to be twice as fast as it would have been in 4/4. in cut time, they are trying to tell you to feel the beat as half notes. Presumably, they prefer writing less beams on notes.

6.12.20  3:25 pm   best thing about things?

      how they are like

6.12.20  3:12 pm   Is 24 too late for me to switch back to a career in music with 7 years of experience that stopped 8 years ago? Please show your work.

      it's too late for you to be younger, so any solution to this that involves you being younger will not work. so that narrows it down completely; we can conclude with total certainty that the correct solution involves you being your current age or older. hope that helps

6.12.20  3:04 pm   what genre do you think describes your style the best?

     'ordinary'

     what other genres of music do you enjoy?

      'regular'

6.12.20  2:39 pm   Are u making a new video sooon

      yes but 'a' is not the right number

6.12.20  2:33 pm   in what field have you made visible progress recently?

     character rigging

     are you happy about it?

     yes

     how can one get as good as you are in this field?

      become stricken with unshakable passions for the umpteenth time, and become convinced it would be both wise and responsible to put it all up in the air

6.12.20  2:14 pm   i used to spend my time imitating your work until i found myself and created my own voice. 

      that seems reasonable

6.12.20  1:55 pm   what is the deal with airline food?

      nevermind that, what's the deal with airlines

6.12.20  1:38 pm   why is music so based on relativity and not in absolute terms 

      must be the nature of consciousness, or perhaps of the entire universe itself

6.12.20  1:37 pm   what is random

      from 1 to 10000:    1635

6.12.20  1:37 pm   whats your opinion on bread

      can potentially cover a large area

6.12.20  1:36 pm   What's your favorite thing to do other than music

      make video to go with the music, or, making a video to make music to go with

6.12.20  1:27 pm   Is the human mind's dependence on categories and putting things into them harmful to our creativity, or do creative people just have different categories and that's what creativity is?

      creativity, i would assume, is recognizing ways the categories can be changed. Or, on a different strand, it could also be, refusing to change categories, and pushing the limits of what can be achieved without changing the category

6.12.20  1:20 pm   what's the first thing you notice about a person?

      whether or not they are a person, which in this case, they are

6.12.20  1:14 pm   do people who don't know you personally ever recognize you when you leave your home

      i easily avoid this by wearing a different brand of hat each time

6.12.20  1:04 pm   I just got an electric keyboard, what's the best way to lwarn and get used to it?

      step 1, turn it on and go through the sounds, see what's on there

6.12.20  12:53 pm   people always tell me to "think outside the box." but what if i really want to BOX outside the THINK?

     could be arranged

     perhaps  i n s i d e  the think if i'm feeling a little ambitious?

     that does not seem any more ambitious than your first suggestion. they both seem to be at an equal level of ambition

6.12.20  12:45 pm   why are your songs so good/epic

      i am trying to attempt to reflect the true nature of our world

6.12.20  12:32 pm   are you ever going to make another song and post it to youtube

      'another' sounds like it only means one, which is all wrong

6.12.20  12:19 pm   Are you autistic? Someone in the comments said you were. I am, and if would be so cool if you were too

      put it this way.......... when i put all my ducks in a row, i attempt to stack them vertically

6.12.20  11:36 am   Why are you so smart?

      ah, that's because of the huge amount of books on the shelf behind me in the video chat

6.12.20  10:48 am   Are all of your videos secretly super deep

      honestly i was expecting it to be obvious

6.12.20  10:25 am   last night you were in my dream and you threw a watermelon at my pet cat

     wasn't me

     and ever since then i haven't slept. how do i fall back to sleep without fear

     i don't know

      and why were you in my dream? 

      was not

6.12.20  10:20 am   what  do ypu  think about ones purpose in life ?

     could be an infinite number of things

      do we have any purpose at all

     yes

6.12.20  9:18 am   what would be more appealing, making an album with a weird mixture of different genres or a bunch of separate but similar albums? 

      albums actually don't appeal to me, even if the individual songs would

6.12.20  9:12 am   tell me a story

      once upon a time objects appeared different sizes depending on how close they are to the camera

6.12.20  9:05 am   is it fun using blender?

      more fun to teach blender to use itself. then i can kick back just worry about the writing

6.12.20  7:49 am   How long do you do vocal warmups before you start recording vocals?

      go for a walk for about 7 minutes. the first few takes also kind of count as a certain kind of warm up because most days it seems i don't even learn how to annunciate english until after a few tries

6.12.20  7:07 am   what to do in a bad day?

      how about something good

6.12.20  6:32 am   Are you making music anytime soon?

      yes

6.12.20  6:23 am   You ever listen to a song and thing to yourself "man, i could have sex with this song" but not like in a sexual way?

      yes

6.12.20  6:22 am   do you feel enlightened? 

      almost

6.12.20  3:36 am   where do you find motivation

      it grows on trees

6.12.20  3:22 am   Why does East Virginia hate west Virginia?

      due to their longitude

6.12.20  3:18 am   is 3d animation worth it

      yes

6.12.20  3:02 am   Your music just ~feels~ so much different than other people's, how do you Do it?

      might have dropped myself on my head when i was young

6.12.20  2:58 am   6.10.20  8:01 pm What do you mean?

     question b:   hot dog question #167954, the search continues for new ways to answer hotdog questions
     question a:   on the day of a full moon, and the days surrounding it, the sun and moon seem to almost exactly trade positions in the sky every 12 hours. they are located on nearly exact opposite sides of us, during that time

6.12.20  2:46 am   Have you thought about ushering in a new era

      yes, doing it now

      0

      gives me a sort of tingly feeling

6.12.20  2:23 am   second language?

      how about chinese

      have you thought about ushering in a new era

      music helps, not gonna lie

      no

      ok
